verse.name: v1
verse.lines: All for Love a father gave newline For only love could make a way newline All for Love the heaven's cried newline For love was crucified

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, how many times have I broken your heart? newline But still you forgive, if only I ask newline And how many time have you heard me pray? newline Draw near to me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Everything I need is you newline My beginning my forever newline Everything I need is you

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let me sing all for love newline I will join the angel's song newline Ever Holy is the Lord newline King of Glory, King of all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: All for Love a saviour prayed newline Abba, Father have your way. newline Though they know not what they do newline Let the cross draw men to you
